name: Pumpkin Pasta with Tomatoes and Basil
description: This vegan pumpkin pasta with tomatoes and basil is perfect for pumpkin addicts and pasta lovers alike. It's ready in less than half an hour!
recipeIngredient: 3 cups  pumpkin (about 17 oz), cut into cubes
1 cup cherry tomatoes, cut into halves
about 30  basil leaves, cut into stripes

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the whole wheat penne according to the instructions on the package. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the whole wheat penne according to the instructions on the package. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: I a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Sauté the onion for about one minute. Then add the pumpkin cubes and cook for 6 minutes. Add the minced garlic and sauté for another minute. Then deglaze with white wine and vegetable broth and allow it to evaporate. This will take about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: I a large pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Sauté the onion for about one minute. Then add the pumpkin cubes and cook for 6 minutes. Add the minced garlic and sauté for another minute. Then deglaze with white wine and vegetable broth and allow it to evaporate. This will take about 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cherry tomatoes and simmer for 2 minutes. Then stir in the cooked penne and the basil leaves. Season with salt and pepper and cook until the pasta is heated through. Sprinkle with pumpkin seeds.
